name: Underswap: Nuts in Bolts (Don't Actually)
description:
Nuts in Bolts (Don't Actually) is visual novel centered around the player romancing DJ Blook/Napstaton and Metta/Hapstabot from the Undertale AU: Underswap. 

The current game is in development but the first chapter of this possibly fairly long visual novel has been uploaded/completed.

 This game includes:

  • 4 endings: 2 Good Endings, a Neutral Ending, and a Bad Ending.
  • Minor Voice Acting
  • Some original music (+ An in-character song cover!)
  • A date with some cute robots!
